alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 1:23PM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...North to northeast winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 to 30 below zero. There could be some blowing and drifting snow through the rest of the afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
